cast.original_title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
cast.overview: Shang-Chi must confront the past he thought he left behind when he is drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.
cast.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings

cast.overview: Natasha Romanoff, also known as Black Widow, confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises. Pursued by a force that will stop at nothing to bring her down, Natasha must deal with her history as a spy and the broken relationships left in her wake long before she became an Avenger.
cast.title: Black Widow

details.biography: Jade Xu, a three-time Wushu/Kung Fu World Champion and aspiring actress who blends natural beauty, extraordinary talent, and cultural variety, was born in China, raised in Italy, and currently resides in the United States. Under the careful supervision of her mother, Xu GuanGuan, Jade Xu began her intense training in the Chinese martial arts at the age of six. She later became one of the most accomplished female Wushu athletes. Following her stellar sporting career, Jade Xu made her entertainment debut as a star of Cirque du Soleil's popular performance Michael Jackson ONE in Las Vegas. She has played supporting parts in a number of Chinese and foreign TV and film projects. Xu also worked on the Marvel film Black Widow.
details.name: Jade Xu
